custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT PollsQuestion.questionId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM PollsQuestion WHERE (PollsQuestion.companyId = ?) AND [$GROUP_ID$] ( (lower(PollsQuestion.title) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (PollsQuestion.description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) )

SELECT {PollsQuestion.*} FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT PollsQuestion.questionId FROM PollsQuestion WHERE (PollsQuestion.companyId = ?) AND [$GROUP_ID$] ( (lower(PollsQuestion.title) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (PollsQuestion.description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) ) TEMP_TABLE INNER JOIN PollsQuestion ON TEMP_TABLE.questionId = PollsQuestion.questionId ORDER BY PollsQuestion.questionId DESC
